Refund request reason: I want a request for all my money I never used this site or sign up for it in my life I been tryna find out how to get into it and get my money back for months can you all please put my money back in my account and cancel this subscription

Please, please sort out this problem, disable all these subscriptions so that there are no more write-offs and I ask you to return my money BACK !!! for December 13, 2020 and for January 13, 2021 !!! I STRONGLY ASK FOR HELP and RETURN MY MONEY !!!

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I used the trial period, then auto subscription was enabled. I have not used the service for a long time. Return the money please

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Subscription is automatic, and I submitted it before and it was answered by you, your subscription has been suspended and we will return your money to you, but so far the money has not returned to me $ 119

I unsubscribed from the subscription, but it turns out that it has not been canceled and has been withdrawing money from me for 2 months !!!!!!!!!!!!! I ask you to return both payments, I did not visit the site all this time and did not use a subscription. Absolutely.

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello. I have used your site several times for free. Apparently, I entered the card details, and somehow the subscription was automatically renewed. Annual. This is terrible for me, since my last money was written off. And I have not used the site for a long time. Please enter into my position and return the money. Thanks in advance.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: hello good I would like you to give me the money back for I need it and at the moment I cannot use it and I would like if you could return the money and next month I will subscribe many thanks

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, please return the money to me. I turned off my subscription but my money was debited. I do not use the paid version, Give me back my money! For this account KZ93722C<NUMBER>

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, please return the money to me. I turned off my subscription but my money was debited. I do not use the paid version, Give me back my money! For this account KZ93722C<NUMBER>

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Describe your issue: i thought it is a free subscription you guys collected money from my account. Please return back the money to my account. Thank you

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello! Please cancel your subscription and return the money. I have not renewed it. Please understand and return my money

Refund request reason: This is not the first time. Moreover, you do not return the funds to the card, but leave it "in your account". And I don't see this money either in my personal account or anywhere else. If you don’t return the money to my card, then at least issue me one month with these funds. Canvas Pro Account number: <NUMBER>

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Please return the money. I do not use CANVA.

Refund request reason: Please return my money back! This was incorrectly ordered

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Please return the money. The subscription was wrong.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: The subscription was renewed automatically, but I don't need that. I ask you to return my money and cancel my subscription.
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I forgot to cancel my subscription and I want to return the money, it's a high amount and I need the money for something else

So I request a refund of my money! I look forward to your return as soon as possible. Thank you <NAME>.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I want to return the funds, I don’t use this. I tried it.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello! I tried to cancel my subscription and I got a subscription pro! Please cancel it and return the money. Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I never I agree with anything. Please please refund my money. I was shock that it billed me with this please return my money.

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Subscription renewed automatically without warning, please return money

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I do not use the service, I forgot to cancel my subscription. I would be grateful if the money was returned
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: please cancel your subscription and return the money

Refund request reason: Hello. I forgot to turn off the renewal of the subscription, it doesn’t suit me, I don’t use your service, it’s very expensive for me. Please return the payment amount to me :( Invoice No .: <NUMBER>

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Good evening. I just subscribed to Canva Pro by mistake and canceled it right away. Can you please return the funds?

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Good afternoon. In December, I wanted to subscribe, it costs 314 rubles, I took a trial with an extension to the Pro mode, but I was charged 1000 rubles, automatically. Issued a return. They agreed to it and told me to wait <NUMBER>days for the receipt of money, they took the subscription. 1.5 months have passed, the money has not been returned, there is no subscription. Solve the issue please

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: The subscription was renewed automatically and on the wrong account. I ask you to cancel it and return the funds. <NAME> is not currently using the service.

Číslo faktury: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I have accidently bought Canva Premium for a year on this account , can you please cancel it and return my money. I have already another Canva Premium, so please cancel it a return my money.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello. I do not need a subscription, please return the funds and cancel my subscription. This was my scholarship ((((Please
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: It was not useful for me :( please return the last write-off

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, I don't actually use the service. Over the last period, I did not have the physical ability to cancel the subscription in order to prevent the withdrawal of funds, today there was a write-off, please help me to return the money paid today. Canva deducted the last amount of money in my account today
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I tried to cancel my subscription, but it didn’t work - some failure, I want to return the money, is it possible?

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: the subscription was renewed automatically, I think that it is still better to notify one day in advance. I am not using your service at the moment, so I want to return the funds

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello! Probably a subscription was automatically issued - I do not confirm it. Big request, cancel the withdrawal of funds in favor of the subscription, and return them to my card. Thank you!
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, where was the money returned to?

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: The account was registered in order to use the available tools while working for the company. I did not use this service, and I no longer work for the company for which the registration was made, and therefore (the subscription was paid) unnecessarily. And I found out about the withdrawal only now. I ask you to return the money for the subscription due to not using the service and subscription options.

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: The account was registered in order to use the available tools while working for the company. Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I didn't want to pay Premium packet, but you take money from my account. I canceled my premium after free period, but again you continued it. Can I please expect the return of money because I don't want premium paket? Thank you in advance

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, my subscription has been automatically renewed. I didn't want to use Canva Pro this month, but it didn't cancel and was charged. I would like to return the funds, thanks in advance.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: PLEASE READ AND DO NOT SEND AUTOMATIC MESSAGES !! Hello again. I hope that this time after so many that I have written to you they finally solve my problem. This invoice has not yet been refunded to me. I changed my card number and therefore this money that you have already returned to me never reached my account. I have already sent several times informing you that after 4 months they still do not return my money. The canva contact always sends me proof of payment from September 22nd and keep waiting. But I can no longer wait because as I change the card number the money that you supposedly returned you still have. PLEASE READ AND DO NOT SEND AUTOMATIC MESSAGES. I NEED MY MONEY.

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello! I haven't been using my account for the last month. I was waiting for renewal letters so I could respond in time. But it turned out that the subscription was made to a mailbox, which did not receive notifications about letters ((I was on a trip. I entered through my main work mailbox - neither designs, nor information from the subscription (After the New Year holidays, I returned home, at the computer, figured out everything , but it's too late (Tell me, please, can you at least partially return the funds? Please! I tried it on the test version - I realized that it was too difficult for me, I don't need paid functions. I won't use them professionally.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello. I ask to return funds on the account from today

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I didn't want to pay Premium packet, but you take money from my account. Can I please expect the return of money because I don't want premium paket? Thank you in advance

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I didn't need templates. I didn't use them. I want to return
